name: Attic Black-Figure Nikosthenic Amphora Fragment
description: Attic Black-Figure Nikosthenic Amphora Fragment; Signed by Nikosthenes (Greek (Attic), active Athens, Greece 540 - 510 B.C.); Athens, Greece; about 530 B.C.; Terracotta; 7.5 × 11.5 cm (2 15/16 × 4 1/2 in.); 77.AE.109; Gift of Ira, Larry and Mark Goldberg; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Attic Black-Figure Nikosthenic Amphora Fragment
